cause.description:
Why Should Animal Abusers Get To have Pets? Thats Not Right. The Whole Point Of This Cause Is To make Sure That Animal Abusers Dont Get Any Animals At All. I Mean Animals Go Through Enough, The Dont Need people Abusing Them!
1. Animals Are Humans Too, They Do What We Do.
2. Animals Have The Right To Live
cause.mission: Stop All Animal Abusers From Being Aloud To Have pets, If They have Pets, More Animals Are Going To Die.
cause.name: Animal Abuse Should Be Stopped
